mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.LOGIN_ID, U.EMAIL, U.NICKNAME, U.NAME, U.MBTI_ID, U.POINT, UA.AUTHORITY, F.FILE_NAME AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME, M.MBTI_NAME FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN USER_AUTHORITY UA ON U.USER_ID = UA.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MBTI M ON U.MBTI_ID = M.MBTI_ID LEFT JOIN "FILE" F ON U.USER_ID = F.REF_ID AND F.CATEGORY_ID = 4 WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.LOGIN_ID, U.EMAIL, U.NICKNAME, U.NAME, U.MBTI_ID, C.PASSWORD, U.POINT, UA.AUTHORITY, F.FILE_NAME AS PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN USER_CREDENTIALS C ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MBTI M ON U.MBTI_ID = M.MBTI_ID LEFT JOIN "FILE" F ON U.USER_ID = F.REF_ID AND F.CATEGORY_ID = 4 LEFT JOIN USER_AUTHORITY UA ON U.USER_ID = UA.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId}
